title: Resolve a Billing Error
description: A customer was double-billed for their premium this month due to a system error.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and review their recent payment history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that two identical payments were withdrawn this month.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the error and apologize to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides good customer service by acknowledging the mistake.

tasks.description: Process an immediate refund for the duplicate payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reverses the second charge and informs the customer the funds will be back in their account in 2-3 business days.
